text: any recommendations for a good cacheControl maxAge value? I use HubL data as part of the query so I think it will reset when I need it to (although not 100% sure)

any idea why a serverSideProps query might be returning null results? Some of my results look like this:
```{
    "id": null,
    "url": null,
    "featured_image": null,
    "featured_image_alt_text": null,
    "html_title": null,
    "tag_ids": null,
    "blog_tags": null
}```
and I don't understand how that's possible

Hello,

We are releasing some new functionality for React Partials and looking for anyone interested in beta testing this new feature.

We are releasing the React counterpart to the `{% module %}` HubL tag: `<Module />`. We are aiming to reduce the need to write HubL, and enable devs to write more of their website in React.

See screenshots below for an example. We are aiming to follow up shortly with `DndArea` React components!
